name: rc::Weak::<T, A>::weak_count

rc::Weak::<T, A>::inner.doc:
Returns `None` when the pointer is dangling and there is no allocated `RcInner`,
 (i.e., when this `Weak` was created by `Weak::new`).

core::option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 8056, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 5190, name: "rc::WeakInner" }), GenericArgs([Lifetime(Region { kind: ReErased })]))) })])

doc:
Gets the number of `Weak` pointers pointing to this allocation.

 If no strong pointers remain, this will return zero.
